claim: Gleemax is among the top three highest converted mana cost cards that use the 2003 card frame style.
extra_info: name of cards refers to name; 2003 card frame style refers to frameVersion = '2003'
reasoning: Gleemax has the highest converted mana cost (1,000,000) among all cards with frameVersion '2003', making it #1. Since it is the top card, it is certainly among the top three, which confirms the claim.

content.text: Good, I can see the `convertedManaCost` and `frameVersion` columns exist. Now let me query for the top 3 highest converted mana cost cards with frameVersion '2003' and check if Gleemax is among them.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT DISTINCT name, convertedManaCost FROM cards WHERE frameVersion = '2003' ORDER BY convertedManaCost DESC LIMIT 10;"
input.description: Get top 10 highest CMC cards with 2003 frame

content.content:
Gleemax|1000000.0
Draco|16.0
Emrakul, the Aeons Torn|15.0
Autochthon Wurm|15.0
Mox Lotus|15.0
Blinkmoth Infusion|14.0
Who // What // When // Where // Why|13.0
